text.name: info1
text.text: Ports, or Source Ports are game engines for

text.name: info2
text.text: classic games that have been updated or

text.name: info3
text.text: rewritten to support additional features or

text.name: info4
text.text: to simply be able to run on modern hardware.

text.name: info5
text.text: Some ports try to recreate the original feel of the

text.name: info6
text.text: game and others aim for a complete overhaul such

text.name: info7
text.text: as adding 3D accelerated graphics, network gaming

text.name: info8
text.text: support and other features that were never a part
